name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jotaro Kujo: Stand Proud – A Legendary Presence in Every Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jotaro Kujo from JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure live wallpaper featuring a clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Jotaro Kujo’s iconic style to your browser with this live wallpaper inspired by JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure. Combining bold visuals with practical tools like a clock and Google search bar, this extension enhances both your browsing and fandom experience.
